data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 11.4, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: You don't get any push notifications for system messages compared to the Desktop app.
data.expected_result: You should get a push notification for new system messages (e.g. adding/removing people, renaming or pinning messages).
data.short_description: No push notifications for system messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Join or be in any Group DM that is not muted - Close your app to get push notifications - Let other users join this Group DM or let a user be removed from the group - Observe it
